channel.title: high-sierra on For X Developers
channel.description: Recent content in high-sierra on For X Developers

item.title: Clean install macOS High Sierra
item.description: General Settings > Keyboard > Text > Disable Capitalize words automatically Settings > Keyboard > Modifier Keys > Change Caps Lock to Control Settings > Trackpad > More Gestures > Swipe between pages -> Switch with three fingers Settings > General > Enable Use dark menu bar and Dock TouchBar Settings > Keyboard > Customize Control Strip > Remove “Siri” button Finder Show hidden files by shortcut Command + Shift + .
